resources.string: Change color scheme and night mode
Shows IDs of modules and more
To simplify debugging, provide a local domain such as http://localhost. See the alert above for more.

WebUI will now consistently use your provided address for all modules, bypass SSL errors, and disable the access to /data/adb/modules/{ID}/webroot. Note that a self-signed local web server is required to use this feature, which is intended for debugging purposes only, is not meant for everyday use, and is used at your own risk.
This is not a valid local domain!
